ygData.subject: Frezslice the shaman
ygData.msgSnippet: I just though I would drop a not that I just pinged 14th last night (I know some of you blast thru levels like a missle but I only play about an hour or so a
ygData.messageBody:
I just though I would drop a not that I just pinged 14th last night
(I know some of you blast thru levels like a missle but I only play
about an hour or so a day). The highest level I have got to so far is
15th as a Elf Pally then I got killed in the middle of a high level
Orc camp and was unable to recover my body (O' well , I like Shamans
better anyways lol). Anyways Ias asking where is the best places to
hunt / get good drops for a 14th level Bar. shaman.

Thanks
Frezslice

14th Circle shaman :)
